backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, lobbies, matches, and game state with access control and authenticated operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI error-handling improvement to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files including pages, hooks, UI, and game systems.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx with a static title and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling view routing and wrapping the app with theme, graphics, and debug providers.
frontend/src/game/components/ImpactEffec: Manages transient bullet impact visual effects with ref-based storage and periodic cleanup.
frontend/src/game/components/PlayerArmsA: First-person weapon model with recoil logic, firing handling, and camera-relative positioning.
frontend/src/game/components/RemotePlaye: Interpolated remote player model using smoothed position/rotation updates and in-world labels.
Creates a WebGL sprite label for player names using a dynamically generated canvas texture.
frontend/src/game/controls/useFpsControl: Custom FPS camera hook handling keyboard movement, mouse look, pointer lock, sprinting, crouching, and jumping with physics-like velocity updates.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: Canvas wrapper configuring WebGL settings based on selected graphics mode and applying background and fog.
Renders a desert outpost scene with sandy terrain, perimeter trees, ground detail, a central building, watchtower, and props based on graphics settings.
frontend/src/game/maps/HarborYardMap.tsx: Builds a harbor yard environment with asphalt ground, trees, weeds, and various stacked shipping containers influenced by graphics mode.
frontend/src/game/maps/JungleCompoundMap: Creates a jungle compound featuring muddy terrain, dense vegetation, and multiple elevated wooden platforms with support posts.
frontend/src/game/maps/mapRegistry.ts: Maps game IDs to map components with display metadata and provides helpers to fetch individual or all map definitions.
frontend/src/game/maps/props/Door.tsx: Reusable door component rendering a frame, door slab, and handle with styles for metal, wood, or reinforced variants.
frontend/src/game/maps/props/GroundDetai: Generates randomized grass tuft meshes based on graphics mode and density within given bounds.
frontend/src/game/maps/props/LowPolyTree: Renders a low‑poly tree with trunk and cone foliage, varying colors and sizes by variant.
Defines a training range map with flat terrain, trees, walls, cover boxes, and small sheds, adapting detail to graphics mode.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OfflineSkirmish: Implements an offline shooting range with moving targets, hit detection, and weapon spread.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OnlineMatchScen: Renders an online match scene with map selection, remote player avatars, and throttled position updates.
frontend/src/game/scenes/TrainingScene.t: Provides a simple training area with walls, boxes, targets, and basic impact handling.
frontend/src/game/settings/DebugSettings: Stores debug settings and persists the performance overlay toggle in localStorage.
frontend/src/game/settings/graphics.ts: Defines graphics modes and returns per‑mode rendering settings such as DPR and shadows.
frontend/src/game/settings/GraphicsSetti: Manages and persists the selected graphics mode using React context.
frontend/src/game/settings/useDebugSetti: Convenience hook for accessing debug settings context.
frontend/src/game/settings/useGraphicsSe: Convenience hook for accessing graphics settings context.
frontend/src/game/weapons/offlineWeapons: Defines offline weapon configs including fire rate, spread, and damage for rifle and SMG.
frontend/src/game/weapons/useWeapon.ts: Hook providing firing logic with rate limiting and direction based on camera quaternion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, including user profile, lobbies, player state, and game actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with theme variables, light/dark mode styles, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the application.
frontend/src/pages/HomeView.tsx: Home screen UI with authentication, navigation, game mode selection, and graphics settings controls.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyView.tsx: Lobby management UI for listing, joining, creating, leaving lobbies, selecting maps, and starting games.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineSkirmishView.t: Offline skirmish gameplay view with canvas rendering, HUD, weapon switching, stats tracking, and pause menu.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineGameView.tsx: Renders the online game view with canvas, HUD, performance overlay, and an ESC pause menu with graphics and debug settings.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingView.tsx: Displays the training mode with a game canvas, HUD, optional performance overlay, and a pause menu similar to the online view.
frontend/src/ui/DisclaimerFooter.tsx: Shows a footer with project disclaimers and a link attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/ui/HudOverlay.tsx: Provides an in-game HUD showing crosshair, stats, sync info, and mode-specific details for training, online, or offline play.
frontend/src/ui/LoginButton.tsx: Button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error recovery states.
frontend/src/ui/PerformanceOverlay.tsx: Displays real-time FPS and graphics mode using a lightweight animation loop.
frontend/src/ui/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to create a username and saves it through backend hooks.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessages.ts: Utility for extracting and normalizing user‑friendly error messages from various backend and agent error formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON describing the game project's state, requirements, constraints, and known issues, including versioning and feature definitions.
